1.description: after clicking the "Product" button, a new component pop out, showing some buttons.

2.action: click the "See it in use" button
2.description: after clicking the "see it in use" button, go to the new page which showing the usage of this product.

3.action: click the second block of text
3.description: after clicking the second block of text, the clicked text become light, and the image on the right hand side change accordingly.

4.description: after clicking the the "Business" button, go to the new page of efficient communication for bussiness.

5.action: move the cursor to the "Create organization" button.
5.description: after moving the cursor to the "Create organization" button, the button turns into green
